summary: Create your own war when you want....
descriptionHtml:
Required: Skyrim
----------------------Description: You never wanted to create an great battle?
Ever wanted to Create Chaos?
Directory you can now do!
How?
With alteration spell directory you can have a army in a wink
How It Works?
The same way a normal spell.
Limits?
no this does not work as an summon, have new kind of spell. 

15 spell are available in a cellar at the entrance of Riverwood (see picture)
Made appear as many people as you want, the only limit is your computer (too much character can slow the performance of your computer)
Between 5 and 8 characters appear coming, wait a few seconds and you\'re facing your enemy (or ally) This will depend on your progress in the game;)
Comment if problem, or endorse it ^ ^
Implementation of a shake made ??days if you like to mod;)
author: Skydrawn33
